subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Scat Daddy pulled away in the stretch for a one-and-a-quarter-length victory over Notional in the $1 million Florida Derby at Gulfstream Park on Saturday.
snippet: Scat Daddy pulled away in the stretch for a one-and-a-quarter-length victory over Notional in the $1 million Florida Derby at Gulfstream Park on Saturday.
